channel.title: Getting Players
channel.description:
Well here's the deal. I have a really good server that has a bunch of potential. I've been working on it for quite awhile, and i have a community of about 10. Problem is, I'm starting to pay monthly for a VPS and it's costing me a decent expense and I'm not sure if it's worth it for such few players. Voting to me seems pointless since it'll take too much to get to the top of the RSPS list, and it seems like advertising never really works. So to get to the point of this topic, does anyone know any good methods of gaining players? I'm looking for a stable community with about 20-30 players that are active. Any ideas are appreciated.
Thanks,
Anthony

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Players
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Putting your server on the mopar status list is a good idea. You don’t have to get to the top for people to join, you just need for people to see that your server has a couple hundred votes, that means its good.

Other than that and maybe Youtube, there aren’t really any good ways to get players from my own experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Players
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

yea here are some but do not take these as a consideration to advertising:

1.Youtube
2.r.u.n.e.l.o.c.u.s. .com remove the periods (It makes it google without periods)
3.Rune-server.org
4.Friends from school, msn, skype, yahoo, aol
5.Sythe.org
6.rspservers.forumotion.com
7. Lol spam or ask people on regular rs to join
8.Pay to have your server on the sponsored list

Read full topic
